Subject: The Brave Hot Rod
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=us-ascii

From: RoboRick007 <rfa007@...>

::Hot Rod::

He was sevearly damaged, and running low on energy. Do to this, he was
too slow to avoid Mobster's shots. He was blasted back, falling to the
ground.
"Oh, sweet Matrix! This hurts like the pit." He strugled to his feet.
"But to stop me, you'll have to kill me!" He ran behind Mobster, when he
was distracted by War Machine. He fired to missiles, at the back of
Mobster's left knee. He hoped he could sheer it off, causing Mobster to
fall, and break.

::War Machine::

War Machine is hit hard by the missile and charge. He falls to the
ground, low on energy.
"I can only stay like this for 10 more minutes. After that I must break
back into the seperate War Machines." He jumped up, trying to Kung Fu
kick Mobster again.
